hints.label: thm-qsd-stability
hints.title: QSD Stability (Champagnat-Villemonais)
hints.content:
317: :label: thm-qsd-stability
318: 
319: Let $\{\mathcal{L}_n\}$ be a sequence of operators with QSDs $\{\rho_n\}$ and absorption rates $\{\lambda_n\}$. Suppose:
320: 1. $\mathcal{L}_n \to \mathcal{L}_\infty$ in resolvent sense
321: 2. The QSDs satisfy uniform moment bounds: $\sup_n \int V \rho_n < \infty$ for some Lyapunov $V$
322: 3. The absorption rates $\lambda_n$ are uniformly bounded away from zero
hints.raw_directive:
